comments.body:
I think this is a bit confusing. Typically only the test code changes the clock setting. So I think the default expectation people would have is that Sleep would _block_ until the test advances the clock far enough (you could implement it via After).

I guess I don't mind this too much but you should explain in a comment.

Happy to comment it. But: maybe the tests shouldn't be advancing the clock manually, and instead, sleeping the way normal non test scenarios do...

I actually wrote this so tests don't need to couple their impl to the clock mocking scheme ..... But maybe I'm not thinking of all the scenarios
